p: About 30% of the A. leucocyma caterpillars brought from the field were parasitized by Hymenoptera ( Apanteles sp. (Braconidae)). Many A. leucocyma caterpillars found in the field had dark coloration, indicating that they were parasitized. Caterpillars of this Lepidoptera were not found in the other plant species assessed ( Table 1).
